title: Why do I find a subject boring? - Quora

response.answer_text: A subject becomes boring when you lose interest in that or you have been studying it continuously for so long that it becomes tedious . And there are other factors as well including boring teachers , students and environment that have a greater impact on a person and lead to boredom . But nothing is boring if you try hard to explore it and study with full concentration and a good will is a must .

There are many factors why you feel bored in certain subjects. The main reason why you're bored is because you're just not interested. There can be classroom factors as well. Like shitty students and teachers. It can even be the classroom atmosphere that causes the boredom. If you want to make classes less boring, then learning with a friend can brighten up your day.
